"Stellar Gift Collection": "Defeat the nearby enemies and collect the Stellar Gift!"

Be careful, it'll impact close by!"

"Oh... a Stellar Gift. But this one seems... different, somehow?"
"Could there be something good inside? Defeat the enemies and get it open."
"Looks like... yes, all enemies defeated. Don't forget to open the Stellar Gift."
"It looks like you weren't able to unlock its protection in time. Well... Don't let this get you down."
